info.label: Devops Consultant
info.brief: Seasoned IT veteran with over 20 years experience in many types of business. Arrived at DevOps from the Ops side.

projects.title: Nearcycle
projects.description: A geo-location based, person to person, free-giving system qith social integration.
projects.summary: This project was really a learning exercise to bolster my existing Python knowledge and it taught me a lot about Django and its many 3rd party modules. For example, the site used some fairly standard technologies to ensure future scalability such as Haystack / Elasticsearch, AWS S3 for image storage, Celery message queues for periodic tasks and machine learning spam checking via CRM114. The project is currently shelved for the future.

projects.title: HomeAssistant
projects.summary: This is a small project to implement various IoT sensors in my house using Zigbee RF comms.

history.summary: Genomics England are responsible for the execution of the 100,000 Genomes Project, a major undertaking by the NHS.
highlights: Contributed to the existing Saltstack config management code
Automated provisioning of Genome ingest pipeline
Python packaging
Supporting the Bioinformatics team and their codebases
Infrastructure rationalisation
Troubleshooting major cloud platform issues

history.summary: Kaplan International are a global English-language teaching company providing learning for individuals, students and businesses.
highlights: Contributed to the existing Puppet config management code
Worked on Python Cloudformation codebase
Got embedded into the Drupal team for new website deployment
Cost saving and Infrastructure rationalisation

history.summary: TeamRock are a global rock and metal brand with a number of business facets including streaming radio stations, print magazines and a major rock music news site.
highlights: Described current ad-hoc infrastructure in code using Troposphere
Re-work the Saltstack configuration management codebase
Improved Docker build/deployment pipeline with leaner images

history.summary: Path Intelligence were a retail data collection and analytics company that tracked people using WiFi, GSM and Bluetooth signals from mobile phones.
highlights: Built PXE hardware provisioning pipeline for field receivers
Initial work on migration of Puppet to Saltstack
Provided level 3 support for complex remote networking issues
Migration of site servers to Google Cloud
Worked on next generation receivers with R&D team

history.summary: iBahn were a provider of networking and IPTV services to major hotel groups such as Hilton, Marriot and Four Seasons.
highlights: Worked with a complex infrastructure of approx 2500 servers using puppet
Provided level 3 support for techincal issues
Gained experience of deploying Wireless APs on a huge scale
Massively reduced the number of outstanding IPTV tickets

history.summary: Luuux.com was a fashion and beauty content farm where user generated content was rewards with virtual credits.
highlights: Provided all WebOps support on their AWS stack
Gained a lot of experience with Drupal 6 and 7
Advised on SEO and social media techiniques to drive traffic

history.summary: Ortso.com was a reverse auction site allowing users to solicit best prices from retailers.
highlights: Was employee #1
Started with complete green field
Designed and built all internal IT infrastructure
Built hosting environment
Worked closely with Latvian development house
Implemented change control and monitoring
Budget management and value driving
Interviewing and staff management
Learned about SEO, KPI measurement, Pentesting
Placed in charge of BC and DR

history.title: BSc Computer and Electronic Systems
history.summary: Studied for two years before leaving to join family multimedia business

history.title: Primary and Secondary School
highlights: Standard Grades - Maths (1), Physics (1) ,Chemistry (1), English (2), Geography (2), French (3)
Scotvec Modules - Intro to Computer Studies, Intro to Programming, Programming Project
Higher Grades - Mathematics (A), Physics (A), Chemistry (B), English (C)

reading.title: Writing effective use cases
reading.summary: Exploring how to better convey user stories.

interests.summary: P3 graded practitioner. Have attended seminars on operational security, home invasion and anti-terrorism.

interests.summary: Interested in global financial developments, economic theory, cryptocurrency and commodities.
